Kejari Bandung Musnahkan Barang Rampasan Senilai Rp1,3 Miliar
06 Nov 2019, 12:06 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Kejari Bandung Musnahkan Barang Rampasan Senilai Rp1,3 Miliar

KBRN, Bandung: Kejaksaan Negeri Bandung memusnahkan barang rampasan dari perkara tindak pidana umum dan pidana khusus yang susah mempunyai kekuatan hukum tetap. Salah satu barang yang dimusnahkan yaitu narkoba jenis sabu dengan berat 2.661 gram atau senilai lebih dari Rp 1,3 miliar.
"Barang yang dimusnahkan ini merupakan rampasan yang sudah memiliki kekuatan hukum tetap, baik dari pidana umm maupun pidana khusus," kata Kepala Kejari Bandung, Nurizal Nurdin disela pemusanahan di halaman kantor Kejaksaan Negeri Bandung, Jln. Jakarta, Kota Bandung, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Nurizal juga mengatakan, barang bukti yang dimusnahkan dari tindak pidana umum sebanyak 678 perkara. Terdiri atas 16,8 kg ganja, 2 ribu gram lebih tembakau gorila, 17,6 gram kokain serta 2.661 gram sabu. Tak cuma itu, juga turut dimusnahkan sebanyak 5.156 tablet psikotropika berbagai merk, seperti ekstasi, dumolid, xanax dan lainnya.
Narkotika jenis sabu dan beberapa lainnya di musnahkan dengan cara diblender, sedangkan lainnya seperti tembakau gorila dan ganja dimusnahkan dengan cara di bakar.
Selain narkotika, Kejari Bandung juga memusnahkan barang bukti dari perkara perjudian berupa ponsel dan alat rekapan. Kemudian ada juga barang bukti perkara pelanggaran Undang-Undang Kesehatan berupa jamu, kosmetik, obat-obatan ilegal, mi dan makanan.
Kejari Bandung juga memusnahkan ratusan senjata tajam, senjata api, STNK palsu, serta ratusan botol minuman keras.

Kejari Bandung Destroys Spoiled Goods Worth Rp1.3 Billion
Nov 6, 2019, 12:06 PM by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Kejari Bandung Destroys Spoiled Goods Worth Rp1.3 Billion

KBRN, Bandung: Bandung District Attorney's Office destroys looted goods from general and special criminal cases that are difficult to have permanent legal force. One item that was destroyed was methamphetamine drug weighing 2,661 grams or valued at more than Rp 1.3 billion.
"The destroyed item is spoils that already have permanent legal force, both from the general and special criminal law," said the Head of the Bandung Prosecutor's Office, Nurizal Nurdin, interrupted by the destruction in the yard of the Bandung District Attorney's Office, Jln. Jakarta, City of Bandung, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Nurizal also said that 678 cases of evidence destroyed from general criminal offenses. Consisting of 16.8 kg of cannabis, more than 2 thousand grams of gorilla tobacco, 17.6 grams of cocaine and 2,661 grams of methamphetamine. Not only that, but also destroyed as many as 5,156 psychotropic tablets of various brands, such as ecstasy, dumolid, xanax and others.
Narcotic types of methamphetamine and several others were destroyed by blending, while others such as gorilla tobacco and cannabis were destroyed by burning.
Besides narcotics, the Bandung Kejari also destroyed evidence from gambling cases in the form of cellphones and recapitulation equipment. Then there is also evidence of cases of violation of the Health Act in the form of herbs, cosmetics, illegal drugs, noodles and food.
Kejari Bandung also destroyed hundreds of sharp weapons, firearms, fake vehicle registration, and hundreds of bottles of liquor.
